subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: James Harden, Arizona State’s 6-foot-5 sophomore guard, is the nation’s fifth-leading scorer at 23.7 points a game, and he makes it look easy.
snippet: James Harden, Arizona State’s 6-foot-5 sophomore guard, is the nation’s fifth-leading scorer at 23.7 points a game, and he makes it look easy.
